Name: Deviled Eggs
Author: Sean Duffie
Instructions: Boil the eggs for ~8-10 minutes, or until the yoke is hardened.
Peel shell and cut the hardboiled eggs in half.
Scoop out the yoke and place in a large plastic bag.
Add all other ingredients to the bag and mix thoroughly.
Cut a hole in the bottom corner of the ziplock back and squeeze out in where the yoke was.
